ConfigHelp.Label: Show Desktop

The show desktop button minimizes all visible windows to quickly get access to the desktop. In addition it will save the positions of all windows before they where minimized, so when clicked again all windows which have been previously minimized will be restored.

By default only the windows on the monitor which you placed the ShowDesktop module on are affected. But by enabling the 'Include all Monitors' option you can change this so that all windows across all monitors are minimized and restored.
Special Features
1) A right click on the show desktop button will reset it to the "show desktop" state if it, for some reason, doesn't reset automatically.
